body: There is no compatibility issue right now as IDEEP training path is brand-new. On the other hand, relying on optimization pass like this before doing inference introduces backward compatibility issue as previously we don't need this.
body_html: There is no compatibility issue right now as IDEEP training path is brand-new. On the other hand, relying on optimization pass like this before doing inference introduces backward compatibility issue as previously we don't need this.
